alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips County through 715 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Malta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
